page.title: 04Shawforth Drum Majorettes
page.content:
Shawforth Drum Majorettes were started in 1981. Local sponsors and fund raisers helped them to buy their own coach to transport the children to carnivals, and provided them with their red and white majorette outfits and musical instruments.
Almost all the children live locally. Ages range from approximately 6 years old to teen-agers. Rehearsals are held in local schools or out of doors in good weather. The majorettes have a full time-table, are to be seen at local galas and have given displays at other venues around the North West, including Pontin's Holiday Centres.
An enthusiastic group of parents act as trainers and supporters.
